title: Why does Lethal Tempo give Attack Speed but not Movement Speed?
body:
It is the only keystone that is Attack-speed only.

I can't see why it would be more broken on {{champion:85}} {{champion:122}}   than  {{champion:96}} {{champion:429}}  . I think ADC's or bruisers wouldn't take it either so why this restriction ?

replies.body: Because its "LETHAL" tempo. Not "let me run away like a little bitch" tempo

> [{quoted}](name=WyvernEgg,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0QNp5RxE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-30T07:21:46.570+0000)
>
> Because its "LETHAL" tempo. Not "let me run away like a little bitch" tempo

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/AMYaaiEw-why-does-conqueror-give-ad-but-not-ap
I read this and saw lethal Teemo.  that is all.
